ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained

cookingTips: Use imitation crabmeat which melts smoothly without becoming tough
Drain tomatoes well to prevent dip from becoming watery
Stir frequently while heating to ensure even melting and prevent sticking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain why this three-ingredient dip is so popular for parties, and how to troubleshoot if the cheese separates.
